title: Con motto
brief_description: A policeman on point duty ‘conducts’ the traffic of a big city. Activity gets faster and faster as people go about their everyday life. Everybody enjoys the fantasy until the authorities arrive, reprimand the policeman and restore normality. Music only - no commentary.
